page.title: 11RECREATION, FIELD SPORTS
page.content:
The Sennybridge Farmers' Hunt is based upon the village. This pack of foxhounds is hunted within a radius of about 15 km of the village. The pack is composed of long-haired Welsh foxhounds, which are immensely shaggy and quite unlike their counterparts of the English lowlands.
The River Usk is an important salmon amd trout fishing river. The waters between Sennybridge and Abercamlais are all in private hands but permits to fish part of them may be obtained from a shop in the village.
Canoeing may be enjoyed in autumn and winter after the end of the fishing season.
